QuestData.Title: A Thorn in the Side
QuestData.Description:
You fools speak of "big game" hunting like it is a thing of wonder. Bah!
None know big game hunting like my kin. Mastery of the hunt, passed down from parent to child, for generations.
I am here to prove it.
I wager that you could not slay more than eleven of the ankylodon beasts that wander this region.
